name: The Haunted Swamp
description: A treacherous wetland shrouded in mist and decay
author: Misthollow Team

9000.title: Edge of the Murky Swamp
9000.description:
The solid ground gives way to soft, waterlogged earth as you enter the
swamp. A thick mist hangs low over stagnant pools of dark water, and the
air reeks of rot and decay. Dead trees with twisted branches reach up
like skeletal fingers toward the gray sky. Strange sounds echo through
the fog - croaking, splashing, and distant moaning. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

9001.title: Shallow Bog Waters
9001.description:
You wade through knee-deep murky water that squelches with each step.
The bottom is soft mud that threatens to pull you down. Patches of
luminescent fungus grow on rotting logs, casting an eerie green glow
through the mist. Insects buzz constantly around your head, and
something large splashes in the distance. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

9002.title: Grove of Dead Trees
9002.description:
A cluster of ancient, dead trees stands here, their bark blackened and
peeling. Spanish moss drapes from the lifeless branches like funeral
shrouds. The ground is carpeted with decaying leaves that release puffs
of spores when disturbed. Carved symbols on the tree trunks hint that
this place was once sacred - or cursed. The air is still and musty. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

9003.title: Quicksand Pool
9003.description:
The ground here looks deceptively solid but is actually a treacherous
quicksand trap. Bones protrude from the surface - grim reminders of
those who came before. A narrow safe path winds around the edge, marked
by ancient wooden stakes driven into firmer ground. One false step could
prove fatal. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

9004.title: Will-o-Wisp Hollow
9004.description:
Strange blue-green lights dance through this hollow, floating just above
the water's surface. They pulse and flicker hypnotically, drawing the
unwary deeper into the swamp. Local legends say these lights are the
souls of the drowned, forever wandering the marsh. The truth may be even
more sinister. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and
musty.

9005.title: Twisted Path Through Reeds
9005.description:
Tall reeds tower overhead, blocking out what little light penetrates the
swamp mist. They rustle constantly though there is no wind, creating an
unnerving chorus of whispers. The narrow path twists between them, and
you catch glimpses of movement in your peripheral vision that vanish
when you turn to look. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

9006.title: Stagnant Pool
9006.description:
A large pool of completely still water blocks the path. Its surface is
covered with a thick layer of algae and scum. The smell is overwhelming
- a putrid mix of decay and methane. Bubbles occasionally rise to the
surface and pop, releasing noxious gases. Something moves beneath the
algae. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

9007.title: Raised Island
9007.description:
A small island of solid ground rises from the swamp waters, covered in
moss and ferns. It's a welcome relief from wading through muck. Ancient
stone pillars stand in a circle here, weathered and cracked but still
imposing. Strange runes are carved into their surfaces, glowing faintly
in the mist. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

9008.title: Cypress Grove
9008.description:
Massive cypress trees grow here, their trunks impossibly wide and their
roots forming complex tangles above and below the water. The canopy is
thick enough to block out the sky completely, plunging this area into
perpetual twilight. Moss and vines hang everywhere, and the croaking of
frogs is deafening. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

9009.title: Graveyard of Ships
9009.description:
The rotting hulks of several small boats lie half-submerged in the murky
water. Their wood is black with age and crawling with fungi. How they
ended up this deep in the swamp is a mystery - there's no navigable
waterway nearby. Inside the wrecks, Visible is bones and the remains of
cargo. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

9010.title: Witch's Warning Path
9010.description:
Stakes driven into the mud line the path here, each topped with a skull
- human, animal, and things in between. Wind chimes made of bones hang
from nearby branches, clattering eerily in the slightest breeze. This is
clearly a warning, marking the territory of something that doesn't
welcome visitors. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
Shadows gather in the corners.

9011.title: Poison Ivy Tangle
9011.description:
Thick vines choke this area, forming an almost impenetrable wall. Many
are poison ivy, their three-leaved plants glistening with toxic oils.
Others are thorny brambles that snag at your clothes and skin. The only
way through is a narrow gap that forces you to crawl, brushing against
the vegetation. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows
gather in the corners.

9012.title: Frog Spawning Grounds
9012.description:
Thousands of frogs and toads cover every surface here - the ground,
logs, lily pads, even the tree trunks. Their constant croaking is almost
deafening. The water writhes with tadpoles and spawn. Some of the toads
are abnormally large, nearly the size of a dog, with bulging eyes that
watch your every move. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is
still and musty.

9013.title: Deep Mire
9013.description:
The water here is chest-deep and impossible to see through. Each step is
a struggle as the thick mud tries to hold you fast. Strange ripples
cross the surface - something large is moving beneath. Dead trees rise
from the water like monuments, their surfaces carved with more of the
mysterious runes. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
Shadows gather in the corners.

9014.title: Before the Witch's Hut
9014.description:
A ramshackle hut rises from the swamp on stilts, smoke rising from its
crooked chimney. The structure seems to defy physics, leaning at
impossible angles yet somehow standing. Herbs and animal parts hang from
the eaves, drying in the fetid air. A cauldron bubbles on a fire pit
outside, filling the air with a sickly sweet smell. The air is still and
musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

9015.title: Abandoned Camp
9015.description:
The remains of an old campsite lie scattered here on a small patch of
higher ground. A rotted tent, rusted cooking gear, and moldy bedrolls
tell of explorers who met an unfortunate end. Claw marks gouge the trees
around the camp, and dark stains on the ground suggest a violent
struggle. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

9016.title: Corpse Flowers Bloom
9016.description:
Massive flowers grow here, their petals a sickly purple-red. They emit a
powerful stench of rotting meat that attracts swarms of flies. The
flowers are corpse flowers, and local legend says they grow only where
the bodies of the wicked are buried. The ground beneath them seems to
move with writhing roots - or worms. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
Shadows gather in the corners.

9017.title: Zombie Feeding Grounds
9017.description:
The ground here is littered with bones - some old and bleached, others
fresh with meat still clinging to them. Dark shapes shamble through the
mist, their movements jerky and unnatural. The smell of decay is
overwhelming. This is clearly a hunting ground for the swamp's undead
inhabitants. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

9018.title: Inside the Witch's Hut
9018.description:
The interior of the hut is surprisingly spacious, defying its small
external appearance. Shelves line every wall, packed with jars of
strange specimens, dried herbs, and bubbling potions. A large cauldron
dominates the center of the room, filled with something that glows with
an eldritch light. Bones, feathers, and talismans hang from the rafters.
Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

9019.title: Heart of the Swamp
9019.description:
You've reached the deepest part of the swamp, where the mist is so thick
you can barely see. The water here is black as ink and impossibly deep.
An ancient stone altar rises from a small island in the center, covered
in dried blood and surrounded by candles that burn with green flames.
This place radiates malevolent power. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The air is still and musty.

9000.name: swamp zombie
9000.long_desc: A rotting zombie stumbles through the murky water, moaning softly.
9000.description: This undead creature is in an advanced state of decay. Waterlogged flesh hangs from its bones, and swamp vegetation has taken root in its rotting body. Its eyes glow with an unnatural green light, and it moves with jerky, spasmodic motions. Despite its decrepit appearance, it seems surprisingly aggressive.

9001.name: will-o-wisp
9001.long_desc: A ball of pale blue light floats eerily through the mist.
9001.description: This mysterious light dances through the air, pulsing with an otherworldly glow. It's unclear if it's a natural phenomenon, a trapped spirit, or something more sinister. The light seems almost alive, and it moves with purpose rather than drifting randomly. Those who follow such lights often meet unfortunate ends.

9002.name: bog hag
9002.long_desc: A twisted, ancient hag stirs her cauldron with gnarled fingers.
9002.description: This creature is a nightmare given form - a bent, ancient woman with mottled green skin and wild, matted hair filled with twigs and moss. Her fingers end in long, black talons, and her teeth are filed to points. She wears tattered rags and reeks of the swamp. Her eyes gleam with malevolent intelligence, and she cackles as she works her dark magic.

9003.name: giant toad
9003.long_desc: An enormous toad squats here, its bulbous eyes watching hungrily.
9003.description: This toad is far larger than any natural specimen, easily the size of a large dog. Its warty skin glistens with toxic secretions, and its wide mouth is filled with rows of needle-like teeth. When it croaks, the sound is deep and resonant, almost like a drum. Its long tongue can shoot out with surprising speed to snatch prey.

9004.name: swamp viper
9004.long_desc: A thick-bodied viper coils on a log, its forked tongue tasting the air.
9004.description: This serpent is mottled brown and green, perfectly camouflaged against the swamp vegetation. It's thick and muscular, about six feet long, with distinctive triangular head and heat-sensing pits. Its fangs drip with venom, and it watches you with cold, reptilian eyes. These vipers are known for their aggressive nature and deadly bite.

9000.name: rusty sword
9000.long_desc: A rusty sword lies half-buried in the mud.
9000.description: This iron sword has seen better days. The blade is pitted with rust and nicked along its edge, but it's still serviceable. It probably belonged to one of the many unfortunate souls who ventured into the swamp and never returned.

9001.name: antidote potion
9001.long_desc: A small vial of green liquid sits on a shelf.
9001.description: This potion glows with a faint green light. The liquid inside swirls on its own, suggesting magical properties. A tag attached to the vial reads 'Antidote' in spidery handwriting. It could cure poison or disease.

9002.name: swamp boots
9002.short_desc: a pair of waterproof swamp boots
9002.long_desc: A pair of well-made boots sits here, surprisingly clean.
9002.description: These knee-high leather boots are treated with oils and waxes that make them completely waterproof. They would be invaluable for traveling through swamps and marshes. The interior is lined with soft wool for comfort.

9003.name: hag's amulet
9003.short_desc: a bone amulet wreathed in dark energy
9003.long_desc: A dark amulet pulses with malevolent power.
9003.description: This amulet is carved from a single piece of blackened bone, etched with foul runes. It radiates dark magic and feels cold to the touch. Despite its sinister appearance, it grants its wearer protection from harmful magic.

9004.name: swamp mushroom
9004.long_desc: A bioluminescent mushroom grows from a rotting log.
9004.description: This mushroom glows with a soft green light. It's a rare variety that only grows in the deepest parts of swamps. While poisonous if eaten raw, it has powerful medicinal properties when properly prepared.

9008.name: censer of mists
9008.room_desc: A censer of mists lies here.

9001.name: will-o-wisp
9001.long_desc: A ghostly light bobs and weaves through the mist.

9002.name: zombie
9002.long_desc: A waterlogged zombie shambles through the muck.

9003.name: ghoul
9003.long_desc: A ghoul crouches over something, its claws dripping.

9004.name: hag
9004.long_desc: A hideous hag cackles as she stirs a bubbling cauldron.

9005.name: snake
9005.long_desc: A massive snake coils in the murky water.
9005.description: You see a giant swamp snake.

9006.name: spirit
9006.long_desc: A translucent spirit drifts aimlessly, moaning in anguish.

9007.name: troll
9007.long_desc: A mossy troll rises from the bog, water dripping from its hide.

9008.name: alligator
9008.long_desc: A massive alligator floats motionless, watching you.
